dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A major evacuation is underway at the Forum Almaty shopping mall right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A major evacuation is underway at the Forum Almaty shopping mall right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shoppers were evacuated from Forum Almaty shopping mall following an anonymous bomb threat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, an anonymous bomb threat came in, so they're clearing the entire building as a precaution.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, an anonymous bomb threat came in, so they're clearing the entire building as a precaution.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shoppers were evacuated from Forum Almaty shopping mall following an anonymous bomb threat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The police department has confirmed that a full commission is on site, uh, inspecting everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The police department has confirmed that a full commission is on site, uh, inspecting everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Almaty's police department, a commission is currently inspecting the building in response to the message.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they've got the bomb squad specialists there too, along with emergency services, which is, you know, standard procedure for something like this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they've got the bomb squad specialists there too, along with emergency services, which is, you know, standard procedure for something like this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Police officers, bomb squad specialists, and emergency services are working at the scene.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're really urging people to stay calm and avoid any panic, which is always the message in these situations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're really urging people to stay calm and avoid any panic, which is always the message in these situations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We urge citizens to remain calm and avoid panic.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And they also made a point to mention Article 273 of the Criminal Codeâ€”making a false report is a serious criminal offense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And they also made a point to mention Article two hundred seventy three of the Criminal Code-making a false report is a serious criminal offense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities also reminded the public that knowingly making a false report of a terrorist act is a criminal offense under Article 273 of Kazakhstan's Criminal Code.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, that carries a real penalty, so hopefully that deters anyone thinking of pulling a prank.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, that carries a real penalty, so hopefully that deters anyone thinking of pulling a prank.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's just a huge disruption, you know? All those shoppers, the stores... it's a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just a huge disruption, you know? All those shoppers, the stores... it's a mess.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they said appropriate measures will be taken based on what the inspection finds. So we'll have to wait for updates.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they said appropriate measures will be taken based on what the inspection finds. So we'll have to wait for updates.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Appropriate measures will be taken based on the results of the inspection, the department's press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Let's hope it turns out to be nothing and everyone can get back to their day safely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Let's hope it turns out to be nothing and everyone can get back to their day safely.
